div.p: The MarkLogic Connector for Hadoop is a drop-in extension to Hadoop that allows users to run MapReduce jobs on data in a MarkLogic Server cluster.

ul.li: Read from MarkLogic, write to MarkLogic, or both
Process Documents, Nodes, and/or Values (including binaries)
Optimized data access (for both locality and streaming IO) across MarkLogic forests
